title: Was Stirling Moss’s 1955 British Grand Prix win a fix?
summary: This was a race which has been the subject of debate and argument almost since the flag fell on it. Not that it had been a particularly complex duel on…

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the 1955 British Grand Prix?
What year did Stirling Moss win the British Grand Prix that is now debated for its fairness?
Stirling Moss is often regarded as one of the greatest drivers who never won a World Championship. What is one of his notable achievements?
